phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
Well of course they would be angry after we keep running amuck all the time.
The master has been called before the Council!
I will yell it out countless times.
I believe your every tomorrow will be shining.
And that is why we are not going to lose!
When it seems like you will be blown away by the headwinds,
grasp this hand, try to take a chance.
Because you are not alone anymore, got it?
Do not give up on your awesome dream!
That is right, do not cry!
Now, with the light shining down upon you.
Do not even think about something like giving up!
Even if you trade being hurt again for strength.
Your eyes, always looking straight ahead,
We are in the middle of the trial...
I presume you are not sleeping, correct?
And Jose has been stripped of his place among the 10 Wizard Saints.
So far, that is as I expected.
But to judge Fairy Tail as completely innocent?
I would not have expected that.
I argued on your behalf, you know.
I am in your debt, Yaji.
When the guild's fixed up, come over for a visit.
I will treat you to some ramen.
I would like a Fairy Ramen with 12 pork slices.
12 slices is a bit much, you think?
Remember you violated the ban on inter-guild conflict in Paragraph 4!
I will put in 20 or 30 slices if you want!
You still have not forgotten, yes?
We overdid it, but every day sure was a fun.
Erza tells me stories once in a while.
Lately many people are of the opinion that Fairy Tail has gone too far too often.
Indeed, Michello and Org have requested you be disbanded.
At this rate you will be facing serious punishment, Macky.
Dead, you are no good to anybody.
For the sake of your health.
You can all take jobs again starting today!
It is just a temporary counter, but do all the jobs you can!
Usually they are just hanging around not taking any jobs.
Oh, yeah, I have not seen Loke around...
I see you have finally fallen for Loke's magic touch then, Lucy...
I just heard that he found my keys, so I wanted to thank him.
I will tell him if I see him around.
By the way, were not your Spirits angry?
Oh, it was not anything enough for them to get that mad about...
I told you not to drop it, girl!
Just remembering makes my butt sting...
Shall I chill it for you?
I do not need innuendo-style sexual harassment.
Lucy, let me see your bright red butt!
And no overt sexual harassment either!
I wonder what she will look like if I make it sting even more!
And you are just the devil!
This time I will tell you straight out.
We do not need weaklings in this guild!
Getting humiliated by Phantom like that...
And wait, I do not even know your names.
And you there, the main culprit, the debutant Celestial Spirit user...
No one has been talking about who to blame for it.
You have no right to say anything when you did not even help us fight!
That is what the master says.
It had nothing to do with me!
Although if I had been there, you would not have had all that trouble.
What kind of fight would it be when you cannot even catch me?
When I inherit the guild, I will get rid of all the weaklings.
As well as anyone who stands against me!
I will make the ultimate guild!
The strongest guild in history that no one can look down upon!
What nonsense is he talking about?
Laxus is the master's grandson, you see.
So when Master retires, the chances that Laxus becomes the next master are quite high.
I would be against someone becoming the master who thinks that way about his allies.
The rumor is that is why he has not been able to retire.
You will just tire yourself out dealing with him.
Want to go do a job?
Together with Gray and Lucy, of course.
I have a sense that we have been together ever since the Eisenwald incident.
Now you get a sense like that?
We all thought it was pretty obvious.
She never stopped to think about it herself?
Let us form a team now.
Or five, if you count Happy.
But do you really want someone like me?
Without you, things just would not fit right, you know?
Looks like Fairy Tail's strongest team is official now.
If I was up against Aquarius, I could not win either.
And her straight-man act is amazing!
The strongest in a lot of different ways.
Let us hurry and do a job.
We will take down the Magic Sect operating in the shadows of the castle town of Lupinus!
So then the master should also pass to the next generation.
His attitude has some big problems.
He is basically a poster-boy for lack of communication.
And then there is Erza, but she is still too young...
It looks like they have gone and done it again.
It seems like Erza and her team destroyed half a city while on a job.
The Council has requested you submit a written explanation immediately!
You do not seem so well, Lucy.
The job at Lupinus from earlier.
Anyway, with all the destruction, most of our reward goes to pay reparations!
At this rate, I will not be able to pay this month's rent!
Then why do not I recommend a perfect job for you?
It is right up your alley, Lucy, and there is no need to worry about destroying anything!
The city from the lullaby incident.
So it is a request for us to use our magic to attract lots of people to see a play, right?
Natsu can shoot fire, and you two can put on a show with your Creation Magic and her Requipping!
Then I will move everyone is hearts with Lyra's singing.
It will be a wonderful performance, do not you think?
If I ever finish my novel, I hope it gets turned into a play.
This is a great opportunity to study staging a play!
It is a pretty nice place.
You are the people from Fairy Tail, yes?
Thank you very much for accepting my request!
Just leave the stage work to us!
We have a bit of a problem...
The actors have all run out on you?
My plays have been more and more unpopular.
So now, the actors are ashamed to be in my productions!
Even my wife tired of me chasing my dream and left me!
You do not get this thanking thing, do you?
I figured it was something, but this?
If you need actors, then you have got some right here!
Well, that does sound kind of fun.
We will not let your dream end here!
Well, might as well let them give it a shot.
Now you do not thank us?
We have one week until opening.
And I have come to save the Princess!
You have got quite the stage presence!
She is really gotten into the role.
I will not lose to her!
After that, when we were not practicing, we were handing out fliers and constructing the set...
Remembering all the lines was pretty tough.
But in the end, we were all in the spirit of it and having more fun than ever.
Some fans are here to see you, thank you very much.
I do not even know where to start!
It is almost time for the debut performance.
It is been so long since I have seen a play!
And wait, what are you doing here, fake Salamander!
It is been a while, Micheal.
After my heart was hit with your fiery fist, I have given up forcibly scouting for pin-up girls!
What did you think it was?
Lucy was thinking of naughty things!
Madame, I will be rooting for you!
Sorry about having you come all this way.
Are not you from Galuna Island?
And are not you from Phantom?
I was also captivated by his power!
Well, I did not make it for you!
It is for that red dog.
How long until you destroy the moon, huh?
Do I even need to say anything?
I am beat, and the performance has not even started...
I have never had such a large audience!
And I never sang in front of so many people!
All that is left is to put on a good show!
A Prince of the West Kingdom fell in love with a Princess of a rival Kingdom...
To save the Princess, the Prince of the West Kingdom went to the mountain of death...
I guess she is one that freezes for the real deal.
M-My na... is... Fred... Prin... to save...
No, I can feel the earnest nervousness in her performance!
One of those Lamaze method actors, I guess.
It is too early for that line!
She is so nervous, she is barely breathing.
You are risking your life just watching this play.
What are we going to do?
Anyway, we need to try whatever we can to cover for her!
Oh, please save me, Prince Frederick!
I have been captured by Seinhart!
If you want the Princess back, then fight me!
Gate of the Clock, I open thee!
Because if Frederick is defeated here, then the story cannot progress!
Great Clock, how excellent of you to come!
Please allow Prince Frederick to rest a little while!
Is this what they call the marriage blues?
Thank you very much, Prince Frederick!
P-Princess Yanderica, let us make many children!
Is not that moving a bit fast?
Your brief respite is now over, thusly!
This is the end for you!
In that case, we must join forces!
You are the one that called it!
What kind of a twist is that?
You two make a run for it!
Princess, what the hell are you doing?
Why do you hog the spotlight when you suck so bad?
Princess Yanderica's awesome body is the best!
What are you doing showing up on your own?
I will always protect you and your nice body, Lucy!
Why did he even show up?
It is all gone to heck!
I have a really bad feeling about this...
Why did it turn out like this?
It is the curse of the moon!
I cannot believe it was such a huge hit.
Not bad for a bunch of stand-ins.
Come on, give us our reward already.
Three performances a day is way too much!
I want to go home now!
I think LLLoke totally lllikes LLLucy!
Well, if you role your tongue like that...
But seriously, Loke is always avoiding her.
He is just playing hard to get.
I do not really get it.
Next time: The Star that Cannot Return to the Heavens!
You just feel like talking that way, do not you?
